alert.note: Alert for Bienville; Bossier (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 08 at 11:43AM CDT until further notice by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following bayou in Louisiana... Red Chute Bayou At Sligo affecting Bienville and Bossier Parishes. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Red Chute Bayou At Sligo. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...Flood waters will begin to recede below the small mobile home park in the Sligo community just south of the Sligo-Caplis highway. Also flooded farmland in southern Bossier Parish between Red Chute Bayou and the Flat River will recede by Tuesday below the flood stage at 31.0 feet. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:15 AM CDT Saturday the stage was 32.7 feet. - Forecast...The bayou crested last night at 9:15 PM CDT at 33.1 feet and will continue falling to below flood stage by Tuesday. - Flood stage is 31.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Do not drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. For more hydrologic information, copy and paste the following website address into your favorite web browser URL bar: water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=shv The next statement will be issued Sunday morning at 1145 AM CDT.
